thread.title: Coleen Rooney looks stylish in black as she and Wayne leave the kids at home head out to Drake gig in Manchester
thread.title_full: Coleen Rooney looks stylish in black as she and Wayne leave the kids at home head out to Drake gig in Manchester

author: Suchandrika Chakrabarti
title: Coleen Rooney looks stylish in black as she and Wayne leave the kids at home head out to Drake gig in Manchester
text:
Celebs Coleen Rooney looks stylish in black as she and Wayne head out to Drake gig in Manchester The WAG looked sharp as she accompanied her man to the Manchester Arena concert last night - the hottest ticket in town Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Drake gets Manchester diners excited ahead of his gig Share this video   Thank you for subscribing!   
Coleen Rooney wore all black to head out on a romantic date night with husband Wayne in Manchester. 
She looks justifiably excited to be seeing the world’s best-selling recording artist of 2016, Drake , who is on the northern leg of his UK tour. 
Coleen bravely cracked out the heels - so probably wasn't intending to get moshing. She teamed a tailored black shift dress with a tailored black blazer for the occasion, and flashed a huge smile. 
Husband Wayne kept in line with Coleen's dresscode, wearing a black bomber jacket, white t-shirt, dark blue jeans and an intense look. Trying to remember all the moves to Hotline Bling, perhaps? Coleen arrives to watch Drake (Photo: Zenpix Ltd) Wayne Rooney arrives at Drake concert at the Manchester Arena (Photo: Zenpix Ltd) Read More 
The Canadian pin-up was caught on camera entering San Carlo, as the Manchester Evening News reports . 
En route to one of the restaurant's private booths, Drake is seen pausing for a second as he takes down his hood, at which point diners start squealing as they recognise the world-famous musician. It's lovely to see Coleen smiling after thieves stole a laptop containing pictures of her late younger sister Rosie (Photo: Zenpix Ltd) There were so many fans heading to Drake's gig that Manchester's railways were clogged up (Photo: Zenpix Ltd) Read More Drake orders £534 worth of Nando's chicken wings in Leeds - but 'nothing above Medium spice' 
Coleen Rooney revealed days ago that sentimental photos of her late sister were stolen from her brother's car. 
She said the car had been broken into while it was parked outside the David Lloyd gym in Speke, Liverpool. Coleen Rooney (Photo: ITV) Rosie passed away aged 14 in 2013 (Photo: Instagram / coleen_rooney) 
She wrote: "Please be aware off a lot of car break ins at @DLLSpeke ... my brothers car got done Sunday and they took a laptop containing sentimental photos of his son and my sister Rosie. 
The theft came just days after what would have been Rosie's 19th birthday. 
Manchester United player Wayne paid tribute to his sister-in-law by sharing a photo of her on his Instagram page with the message: "Miss this face every day. Happy Birthday Rosie." Like us on Facebook
